messages.text:
FYI, we just migrated NMPS (which returns SKUs for the given calories) to the new cluster on *staging*.
There shouldn't be any issue your side, but if you something is broken, please ping me :slightly_smiling_face:
messages.raw_text:
FYI, we just migrated NMPS (which returns SKUs for the given calories) to the new cluster on *staging*.
There shouldn't be any issue your side, but if you something is broken, please ping me :slightly_smiling_face:

thread_replies.text: Switched 10% of the live traffic to the new cluster. prepare for incident(s)
Great time to be on call :fine-party:
Switched 50% :slightly_smiling_face:. Will go to 100% by eow

We completely migrated NMPS to FTCP.

On staging, we don't even have the app on the legacy cluster anymore and everything goes directly to the FTCP

For live, We are serving 100% of the traffic from FTCP, but we still have the apps running on the legacy cluster as well, so we can switch back in case of something goes wrong. I'll remove the app from the legacy cluster for live, early next week :slightly_smiling_face:

messages.text:
Hi team, can you please take a look at the `tpt-selected-meals-bug-tracing` span you are collecting? you have sessions that are collecting up to a hundred of these spans
https://ui.honeycomb.io/hellofresh/datasets/traces-frontend-live/result/daEDSzTKFrh?vs=hideCompare
messages.raw_text:
Hi team, can you please take a look at the `tpt-selected-meals-bug-tracing` span you are collecting? you have sessions that are collecting up to a hundred of these spans
<https://ui.honeycomb.io/hellofresh/datasets/traces-frontend-live/result/daEDSzTKFrh?vs=hideCompare>

thread_replies.text: https://github.com/hellofresh/web/blob/master/app/spaces/whitelabel/modules/whitelabel-web/packages/components/my-deliveries-components/src/sections/menu/meals/carousel/useSelectedMealsBugTracing.ts#L35
the problem is that `chosenCourses` is being defined on every re-render, so this useEffect is triggering a lot of times

Hey, yeah, we have noticed that. The only thing that's weird is that this trace was implemented 11 months ago, and HC is showing data only from May onwards :confused_dog:

https://ui.honeycomb.io/hellofresh/datasets/traces-frontend-live/result/BY2HoG6QRdt?vs=hideCompare
I wanted to check that, because I believe when I implemented that trace I was specifically QAing it for not firing on every re-render
Regardless of that I will create a ticket to fix this

> showing data only from May onwards
Honeycomb has 60-day data retention
Ok, that explains it

> I was specifically QAing it for not firing on every re-render
maybe this was fine when the span was implemented, but I can see that `chosenCourses` comes from two different hooks (useProteinsCarouselData, useGetSelectedSingleProteinRecipeIndexes) that are not memoising the returned array
Yeah, I am pretty sure something behind chosenCourses variable changed over the time. Created a ticket, we will have a look into this :+1:

messages.text: Cross sharing https://hellofresh.slack.com/archives/C088GTM8QTF/p1759305573169559, could you please review this https://github.com/hellofresh/web/pull/58127 ?
messages.raw_text: Cross sharing <https://hellofresh.slack.com/archives/C088GTM8QTF/p1759305573169559|here>, could you please review this <https://github.com/hellofresh/web/pull/58127|PR> ?

thread_replies.text: is it working? :smile:
the pipeline is flaky and failing and I have no idea TBH

yup, most likely flaky e2e

and did you test the script itself? did you run the command?
no I didn't, the script doesn't have tests, I just changed the host

url would not be covered by tests anyway I think

but ok, I will test the command if it still works, give me a moment :+1:
Lemme try to turn this into CURL
yes please send me the curl so i can check feom my side

```curl --location --request POST 'https://mss-cart-service-backoffice.live-k8s.hellofresh.io/api/v1/selection/?country=KN'```
just this alone responds with 404
ofc u need to have the request body
but we just changed the host

```curl --location 'https://mss-cart-service-backoffice.live-k8s.hellofresh.io/api/v1/selection/?country=KN' \
--header 'user-agent: web/toolbox/kn-migrate-preferences' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..mccJuTqWj6P1CO7wBr0tg8vsM3SbPkyD8tRM90MrFVE' \
--data '{
  "customerUuid": "a1d5d9cb-3a56-451b-a5bc-d6ac8f154679",
  "customerId": 6322600,
  "preset": "dry-chicken",
  "productSku": "KN-DRC1-1-800-0",
  "subscriptionId": 3126717,
  "selection": "1",
  "interval": "2025-W41"
}'```
i'm afk now lemme check after 30mins
@U01PE2S4ZL6 just remove the / after the selection `selection/?`

I tried myself and it worked
```curl --location 'https://mss-cart-service-backoffice.live-k8s.hellofresh.io/api/v1/selection/?country=KN' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'User-Agent: web/toolbox/kn-migrate-preferences' \
--data '{
    "customerUuid": "a1d5d9cb-3a56-451b-a5bc-d6ac8f154679",
    "customerId": 6322600,
    "preset": "dry-chicken",
    "productSku": "KN-DRC1-1-800-0",
    "subscriptionId": 3126717,
    "selection": 1,
    "interval": "2025-W41"
}'```
I pushed the change to remove it
@U018UCEFJ65 /resolve
ah it's not a ticket :smile:
cool, approved it. if you don't mind please in the future test the code you are changing before asking for code review, as we are typically occupied

> cool, approved it. if you don't mind please in the future test the code you are changing before asking for code review, as we are typically occupied
typically we would ask you to do the change for us, learning how to use these scripts from our side will not be ideal

that's fine, but we would create a ticket then and allocate resources accordingly, here I took it more as CR. I would not expect to understand the whole scirpt, but just testing url you changed would be enough. anyway its resolved :+1:

Thanks Mateusz, I appreciate :+1:
FYI, we will soon reject any direct calls to BCS & MAS, and only calls through mss-cart-service will be allowed.

messages.text:
Hey everyone :wave:
I’ve spotted something odd when adding new pups on staging – they seem to be created with a normal delivery instead of a Trial Box. All Quick actions are enabled on the first delivery (e.g. reschedule, plan change), and deactivating the account cancels the delivery too.
messages.raw_text:
Hey everyone :wave:
I’ve spotted something odd when adding new pups on staging – they seem to be created with a normal delivery instead of a Trial Box. All Quick actions are enabled on the first delivery (e.g. reschedule, plan change), and deactivating the account cancels the delivery too.

thread_replies.text: Screenshots for reference:
Hey Ellen, there are changes being done to the first order on staging to test out a new feature. It's expected that certain actions will no be available for the first order that weren't previously.
That being said the first order should still be a trial box, could you check the Order total dropdown on the dashboard and see if it says trial box or not?
yup looks right :+1:
Thanks for clarifying!

@group
Is this repo only for 1 BFF or it could host multiple?

• new-ventures-bff
• consumer-mega-bff
• krass-bff

Then we go with new-ventures-bff

messages.text: Hi, everyone. I have small PR with changing host from bcs to cart service api - https://github.com/hellofresh/web/pull/60006/files how to deploy it on ahoy/staging to test that it works well.
